titles.title: Mail Delivery to Physically Handicapped Act of 1993
To amend title 39 of the United States Code to provide for door delivery of mail to the physically handicapped, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Mail Delivery to Physically Handicapped Act of 1993 - Requires, upon approval of an application which includes a physician's certification of need, the delivery of mail to the door of handicapped individuals.
